5.cmd: find ./inhere/* -type f -size 1033c | xargs grep -L '[^a-zA-Z0-9[:space:]]' | xargs cat

6.cmd: find /* -type f -size 33c -user bandit7 -group bandit6 2>/dev/null | xargs cat

12.cmd: mkdir -p /tmp/wowz; cp ~/data.txt /tmp/wowz; cd /tmp/wowz; cp data.txt hexdump; xxd -r hexdump compressed_data.gz; gzip -d compressed_data.gz; mv compressed_data compressed_data.bz2; bzip2 -d compressed_data.bz2; mv compressed_data compressed_data.gz; gzip -d compressed_data.gz; mv compressed_data compressed_data.tar; tar -xf compressed_data.tar; tar -xf data5.bin; mv data6.bin data6.bz2; bzip2 -d data6.bz2; tar -xf data6; mv data8.bin data8.gz; gzip -d data8.gz; cat data8 | awk '{print $4}'; cd ~; rm -rf /tmp/wowz;

16.cmd: mkdir -p /tmp/wow && nmap -p 31000-32000 localhost | tee /tmp/wow/log.log | grep open | awk '{print $1}' | sed 's/\/tcp//g' | tr '\n' ',' | sed 's/,$//' | xargs -I{} nmap -p {} --script ssl-enum-ciphers localhost | tee /tmp/wow/ssl_log.log | awk '/ssl-enum-ciphers/ {print prev} {prev=$1}' | sed 's/\/tcp//g' | tr '\n' ',' | sed 's/,$//' > /tmp/wow/tls_ports.log && for port in $(cat /tmp/wow/tls_ports.log | tr ',' ' '); do echo 'kSkvUpMQ7lBYyCM4GBPvCvT1BfWRy0Dx' | ncat --ssl localhost $port; done | awk 'NR >= 3'; cd ~; rm -rf /tmp/wow
